solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    --newline--        public int countBattleships(char[][] board) {--newline--            int m = board.length;--newline--            if (m==0) return 0;--newline--            int n = board[0].length;--newline--            --newline--            int count=0;--newline--            --newline--            for (int i=0; i<m; i++) {--newline--                for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {--newline--                    if (board[i][j] == '.') continue;--newline--                    if (i > 0 && board[i-1][j] == 'X') continue;--newline--                    if (j > 0 && board[i][j-1] == 'X') continue;--newline--                    count++;--newline--                }--newline--            }--newline--            --newline--            return count;--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--}
